A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The simple fact that this episode in the Star Wars saga receives such a low rating by fans is the simple fact that storyline is more important than the special effects bling. Yes\, we go to be entertained by the special effects\, it’s Star Wars. We expect nothing less than to be awed by massive spaceships and explosions. What continues to be missing time and again is a good story that is believable and the fans can become immersed in. This episode just didn’t have that and thus failed.
